sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getAnime } from '../Service/Anime' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function DetailofAnime() { const { id } = useParams() const [Anime, setAnime] = useState() useEffect(() => { getAnime(id).then((data) => { setAnime(data); }) }, [id]) if (!Anime) { return } return (

{Anime.Name}

{Anime.Describe}

{/* Percentage Text */}
{Anime.Rating}
) }
